title: Growing A Successful Cannabis Brand With Wassef Tawachi
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Wassef Tawachi is co-founder and CEO of Ciencia Labs, a California based manufacturer of science-forward cannabis products and brands. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss getting in at the height of cannabis fervor, avoiding career burnout and CBD bearishness. We also cover the science of cannabis, how to build a successful brand in a saturated space and the unique advantages and disadvantages of the California market. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
